title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
Discover the Power of Electricity and Magnetism with Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!

Ignite your child's curiosity and passion for science with our Parents' Choice Silver Award-winning STEM learning kit. Designed for children aged 8 and above, this interactive science kit offers 25 guided experiment lessons to explore the fascinating world of electric motors, generators, and magnetic fields.

With our 48-page full-color student guide, students in Grades 3-6 can easily follow along and learn valuable concepts such as electric motor function, electric generator function, and the understanding of magnetic fields and electric current. The comprehensive 60-page full-color manual from 2012 provides clear instructions and engaging illustrations to support their learning journey.

This electronic learning kit includes an electric motor with transparent plastic, allowing children to observe the inner workings of the motor. The motor can be configured for battery-powered operation or reconfigured into a hand-crank electric generator, giving your child hands-on experience with energy conversion.

Our experiments cover a wide range of topics, including magnetism, circuit building, and gears and drive trains. Children can experiment with magnets, build simple circuits, and learn about gears and drive trains in a fun and engaging way.

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit measures 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, 2.6 inches in depth, and weighs only 1.3 pounds, making it easy to store and transport.

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to inspire your child's love for science and technology. Order your Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit today and watch your child's knowledge and skills grow!
